description: Complete system overview documenting the high-level architecture, key components, and integration strategy between Rust, QuickJS, and svgo
Detailed documentation of the SVG optimization workflow, including the data flow between Rust and JavaScript layers, optimization algorithms, and transformation pipeline
Technical details of the QuickJS integration, JavaScript code bundling strategy, and the bridge between Rust and svgo's JavaScript optimization code
Comprehensive documentation of the FFI interface design for Python and C++ bindings, including data marshaling and API compatibility requirements
